boat.construction_details: Carvel Pine on Steamed Oak/Elm ribs Copper fastened
boat.full_description:
Discovered barely afloat at Itchen Ferry Boatyard in 1989, with no information. Even the name was only heresay.

Investigation showed that she was originally a centreboarder, replaced at some point with a caste iron keel. There is no reverse turn to the bilge

Undergoing major repair work Apr 1990 Log 90/1
boat.name: Anne
